Header.title: PromptAI Studio
Header.paragraph: Smart IT solutions powered by Artificial Intelligence. We transform your business ideas into powerful digital products that drive results.

About.paragraph: We create digital products that work for you. With us, your business speaks the language of technology ‚Äî fast, smart, and to the point. Wherever you are ‚Äî we're with you. Online. Always.

Services.name: High-Converting Websites
Services.text: We design and develop websites and landing pages that convert visitors into customers, using data-driven approaches and modern design principles.

Services.name: Web Platforms & CRM
Services.text: Custom web platforms and CRM systems that streamline your business operations, built with TypeScript, NestJS, React, and other cutting-edge technologies.

Services.name: AI-Powered Chatbots
Services.text: Smart chatbots for Telegram, Discord, and Instagram that engage your audience 24/7, handle customer queries, and automate routine tasks.

Services.name: GPT AI Assistants
Services.text: Custom GPT-based AI assistants that integrate seamlessly with your website, providing intelligent responses and enhancing customer experience.

Services.name: Modern Development
Services.text: Full-stack development using TypeScript, NestJS, React, and modern frameworks to create fast, secure, and scalable applications.

Services.name: Digital Transformation
Services.text: End-to-end digital transformation solutions that help your business leverage the power of AI and modern technology.
